courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Environmental Management
courses.description: This program prepares students to address environmental challenges through sustainable resource management, policy development, and environmental protection strategies.

course_units.title: Introduction to Environmental Management
course_units.description: Overview of environmental management principles and practices.

course_units.title: Environmental Chemistry
course_units.description: Chemical principles and processes in environmental systems.

course_units.title: Ecology and Ecosystems
course_units.description: Fundamentals of ecological principles and ecosystem functions.

course_units.title: Environmental Economics
course_units.description: Economic concepts applied to environmental issues and policy.

course_units.title: Earth Science
course_units.description: Geological and atmospheric processes relevant to environmental management.

course_units.title: Environmental Law and Policy
course_units.description: Legal frameworks and policies for environmental protection.

course_units.title: Water Resources Management
course_units.description: Principles and practices of managing water resources.

course_units.title: Solid Waste Management
course_units.description: Systems and technologies for managing solid waste.

course_units.title: Environmental Impact Assessment
course_units.description: Methods and procedures for assessing environmental impacts.

course_units.title: Soil and Land Management
course_units.description: Management of soil resources and land use planning.

course_units.title: Biodiversity and Conservation
course_units.description: Principles and strategies for biodiversity conservation.

course_units.title: Environmental Monitoring
course_units.description: Techniques for monitoring environmental quality.

course_units.title: Pollution Control
course_units.description: Technologies and strategies for controlling environmental pollution.

course_units.title: Natural Resource Management
course_units.description: Sustainable management of natural resources.

course_units.title: Environmental Governance
course_units.description: Governance systems and institutions for environmental management.

course_units.title: Climate Change and Adaptation
course_units.description: Understanding climate change impacts and adaptation strategies.

course_units.title: Environmental Health
course_units.description: Environmental factors affecting human health and well-being.

course_units.title: Sustainable Development
course_units.description: Principles and practices of sustainable development.

course_units.title: Environmental Risk Assessment
course_units.description: Methods for assessing and managing environmental risks.

course_units.title: Environmental Planning
course_units.description: Strategic planning for environmental management.

course_units.title: Research Methods in Environmental Management
course_units.description: Research methodologies for environmental studies.

course_units.title: Environmental Management Capstone Project
course_units.description: Independent research project in environmental management.

course_units.title: Environmental Conflict Resolution
course_units.description: Approaches to resolving environmental conflicts and disputes.

course_units.title: Professional Practice in Environmental Management
course_units.description: Professional and ethical aspects of environmental management practice.
